listAsq.title: What is the scope of your restaurant property acquisitions?
listAsq.content: Our acquisition program encompasses a wide range of food service properties, including standalone restaurants, cafes, fast-food establishments, and fine dining venues. We evaluate properties based on location, building condition, and market potential, regardless of the current cuisine or concept.

listAsq.title: Do you acquire only the property, or the business as well?
listAsq.content: While our primary focus is on real estate acquisition, we recognize the integrated nature of restaurant properties. We're open to discussing full business acquisitions, including operations, when it aligns with our investment strategy and the seller's goals.

listAsq.title: How do you approach the valuation of restaurant-specific equipment and fixtures?
listAsq.content: Our valuation process includes a comprehensive assessment of all on-site equipment and fixtures. We can structure deals to include these assets, ensuring a fair value is attributed to specialized kitchen equipment, dining room furnishings, and other restaurant-specific installations.

listAsq.title: Can you facilitate the purchase of an actively operating restaurant?
listAsq.content: Absolutely. We have extensive experience in acquiring operational restaurants. Our team is adept at structuring transactions that minimize disruption to ongoing business activities, ensuring a smooth transition of ownership while maintaining operational continuity.

listAsq.title: How do you navigate the complexities of liquor license transfers in restaurant acquisitions?
listAsq.content: Liquor license transfers are a routine part of our acquisition process for applicable properties. Our legal team is well-versed in the intricacies of liquor license regulations across various jurisdictions. We manage all aspects of the transfer process, liaising with relevant authorities to ensure compliance and continuity of licensing.

listAsq.title: What factors do you consider when evaluating a restaurant property's potential?
listAsq.content: Our evaluation process is multi-faceted, considering factors such as location demographics, foot traffic patterns, property condition, kitchen capacity, dining area layout, and local market trends. We also assess the potential for concept modification or expansion, always looking for properties with strong underlying real estate value.
